statements: DELETE FROM Patients WHERE patient_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM appointments WHERE appointment_time = '10:00' AND patient_id = 1;
DELETE FROM patients WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01' AND gender = 'M';
